FactionDef.label: Civil California State
FactionDef.description: The Civil California State is a faction of survivors and settlers who have banded together to rebuild society in the aftermath of a devastating conflict. They are known for their resourcefulness, resilience, and commitment to community values. The CCS emphasizes cooperation and mutual aid among its members, striving to create a safe and prosperous environment despite the challenges they face in the post-apocalyptic world.
